mapper.select: select o.id deptId,o.`name` deptName,uu.`name` mgName from sys_office o LEFT JOIN sys_user uu ON uu.office_id=o.id where o.del_flag='0' and uu.isFlag='1' ORDER BY sort asc
select uu.`name`,uu.id from ticket_distribute_user uu where uu.del_flag='0' and uu.office_id=#{deptId}
select uu.ID from sys_office o LEFT JOIN sys_user uu ON uu.office_id=o.id where o.del_flag='0' and uu.isFlag='1' and o.id=#{deptId} ORDER BY sort asc
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ticket
ticket_id,
ticket_type,
title,
channel,
ticket_level,
address,
event_time,
device_code,
pump_id,
report_name,
start_time,
end_time,
create_Date,
update_Date,
create_by,
update_By,
ticket_reason,
ticket_description,
`status`,
valid_Flag,
dept_Id,
#{ticketId},
#{ticketType},
#{title},
#{channel},
#{ticketLevel},
#{address},
#{eventTime},
#{deviceCode},
#{pumpId},
#{reportName},
#{startTime},
#{endTime},
#{createDate},
#{updateDate},
#{createBy.id},
#{updateBy.id},
#{ticketReason},
#{ticketDescription},
#{status},
#{validFlag},
#{deptId},

INSERT INTO ticket_log
id,
ticket_id,
status,
APPROVE_OPINION,
APPROVE_OPERATION,
VALID_FLAG,
CREATE_BY,
CREATE_DATE,
UPDATE_BY,
UPDATE_DATE,
NODE_NAME,
NODE_ID,
#{id},
#{ticketId},
#{status},
#{approveOpinion},
#{approveOperation},
#{validFlag},
#{createBy.id},
#{createDate},
#{updateBy.id},
#{updateDate},
#{nodeName},
#{nodeId},

INSERT INTO ticket_to_do
id,
ticket_id,
status,
user_Id,
biz_id,
VALID_FLAG,
CREATE_BY,
CREATE_DATE,
UPDATE_BY,
UPDATE_DATE,
#{id},
#{ticketId},
#{status},
#{userId},
#{bizId},
#{validFlag},
#{createBy.id},
#{createDate},
#{updateBy.id},
#{updateDate},
mapper.update:
update alarm_statistics a
a.confirm_status= #{confirmStatus},
a.alarm_status= #{alarmStatus},
a.ticketId= '',
1=1
and a.ticketId=#{ticketId}

update ticket a
a.ticket_type= #{ticketType},
a.pump_id= #{pumpId},
a.title= #{title},
a.channel= #{channel},
a.device_code= #{deviceCode},
a.`status`= #{status},
a.valid_Flag= #{validFlag},
a.ticket_Level= #{ticketLevel},
a.start_time= #{startTime},
a.end_time= #{endTime},
a.ticket_reason= #{ticketReason},
a.ticket_description= #{ticketDescription},
a.dept_id= #{deptId},
a.ticket_Distribute_By= #{ticketDistributeBy},
where a.ticket_id=#{ticketId}
mapper.select: SELECT t.CREATE_BY FROM ticket_log t WHERE t.create_date = ( SELECT max( c.create_date ) FROM ticket_log c where c.ticket_id=#{ticketId} )
SELECT t.CREATE_BY FROM ticket t WHERE t.ticket_id=#{ticketId}

SELECT t.ticket_id ticketId FROM ticket t
1=1 and TO_DAYS(`create_Date`)=TO_DAYS(NOW())
and t.ticket_type=#{ticketType}
order by create_date desc limit 1

SELECT t.ticket_id ticketId, g.approve_opinion approveOpinion, g.approve_operation approveOperation, u.`name` ticketLogName, g.CREATE_Date createDate, t.`status` AS status, g.node_id nodeId, g.node_name nodeName, ( CASE
WHEN t.`status` = '1' THEN '新建' WHEN t.`status` = '2' THEN '待分发' WHEN t.`status` = '3' THEN '处理中' WHEN t.`status` = '4' THEN '审核中' WHEN t.`status` = '5' THEN '完成' ELSE '' END ) currentStatusName FROM ticket_log g LEft JOIN ticket t ON t.ticket_id= g.ticket_id LEFT JOIN device de ON de.ID = t.device_code LEFT JOIN pump_house p ON p.id = de.ID_PUMP_HOUSE LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.id=g.create_by WHERE t.valid_flag = '1'
and t.ticket_Id=#{ticketId}
ORDER BY g.CREATE_Date asc

select id ,`NAME` name,ADDRESS address from pump_house
where id_project = #{projectId}
select id,`NAME` name from device where ID_PUMP_HOUSE=#{id}
